def_cn: （问题或词语）哄骗性的，意味深长的，另有所指的
def_en: A loaded question or word has more meaning or purpose than it appears to have, because the person who uses it hopes it will cause people to respond in a particular way.

def_cn: （特点）浓烈的，深厚的，丰富的
def_en: If something is loaded with a particular characteristic, it has that characteristic to a very great degree.

def_cn: （不公平地）有…倾向的，有…偏向的，倒向…的
def_en: If you say that something is loaded in favour of someone, you mean it works unfairly to their advantage. If you say it is loaded against them, you mean it works unfairly to their disadvantage.
